sprint_goal: Establish core calculator functionality and the complete user authentication lifecycle (register, login) to unblock all dependent features.
epic_coverage: Core Calculator Functionality, User Account Management
key_deliverables: Functional basic calculator with angle modes; User registration via Cognito; User login with OAuth 2.0 PKCE flow; Backend JWT authentication guard.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a basic calculation. Show the user registration process. Show a successful user login and the establishment of a session.
success_criteria: All US-001, US-052, US-053 acceptance criteria met. CI/CD pipeline is functional for frontend and backend deployments.
risk_factors: Complexity of OAuth 2.0 PKCE flow; Correct configuration of AWS Cognito and IAM.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming on authentication logic; Early infrastructure validation.
integration_windows: Integration between FE and BE for auth on Day 5-7.

sprint_goal: Implement foundational user data persistence for history and variables, and deliver the first specialized electronics mode (Ohm's Law).
epic_coverage: User Data Persistence, Advanced Electronics Features, User Account Management
key_deliverables: Persistent calculation history for logged-in users; Ability to define, persist, and use variables; Functional Ohm's Law calculator.
demo_objectives: Log in and show pre-existing history. Perform a calculation and show it persists after refresh. Define a variable (e.g., `x=10`) and use it in a new calculation (`x*5`). Demonstrate the Ohm's Law calculator.
success_criteria: All US-012, US-020, US-027 acceptance criteria met. Backend APIs are secure and fully tested.
risk_factors: Potential bugs in parser logic for variable assignment/usage; Authorization logic bugs allowing data leakage.
mitigation_strategies: Comprehensive unit testing for parser; Security-focused integration tests for data scoping.
integration_windows: Continuous FE/BE integration for history and variables APIs.

sprint_goal: Deliver the end-to-end user-extensible functionality by implementing the custom mode creation wizard and the secure execution engine. Complete the 555 Timer mode.
key_deliverables: Multi-step wizard for creating custom modes; Secure AWS Lambda sandbox for formula execution using `isolated-vm`; Backend APIs for custom mode CRUD and execution; Functional 555 Timer Astable mode calculator.
demo_objectives: Create a new custom mode from scratch (e.g., 'Area of Circle'). Launch the new mode and use it to perform a calculation. Demonstrate the 555 Timer calculator.
success_criteria: All US-041, US-047, US-037 acceptance criteria met. The `isolated-vm` sandbox demonstrably prevents access to unauthorized functions.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Security vulnerability in `isolated-vm`. RISK-006: Lambda cold starts impacting performance. Complexity of `isolated-vm` API.
mitigation_strategies: Strict zero-permission IAM role for Lambda; Provisioned Concurrency for Lambda in production; Pair programming on sandbox implementation.
integration_windows: Integration of NestJS backend with Lambda sandbox on Day 4-6.
burndown_target: Monitor burndown closely due to high-complexity tasks.

sprint_goal: Implement critical data resilience (offline) and legal compliance (GDPR) features, preparing the application for a robust production launch.
key_deliverables: Service Worker for offline application loading; IndexedDB queuing for offline data changes; Sync manager for data synchronization on reconnection; Asynchronous job for GDPR/CCPA data export.
demo_objectives: Load the application with network disabled. Perform calculations offline. Reconnect and show data syncing. Initiate a data export and show the email with a download link.
success_criteria: All US-060 and US-071 acceptance criteria met. Offline sync logic handles conflicts correctly.
risk_factors: RISK-004: Data loss from sync logic bug. RISK-008: Incorrectly configured Service Worker. Complexity of orchestrating multiple AWS services for data export.
mitigation_strategies: Extensive E2E testing for offline scenarios; Use of Workbox library for Service Worker; Thorough integration testing of the data export async flow.
integration_windows: End-to-end testing of offline sync on Day 6-8.
burndown_target: Non-linear burndown expected due to complex integration tasks.

sprint_goal: Achieve full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across the entire application to ensure it is usable by people with disabilities.
key_deliverables: Fully keyboard-navigable application; Screen-reader compatibility for all user flows; CI pipeline with automated accessibility checks; Completed manual accessibility audit report.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a core user flow (register, login, calculate, save variable) using only a keyboard and a screen reader (NVDA or VoiceOver).
success_criteria: Application passes a full WCAG 2.1 Level AA audit with no critical or serious violations. All US-063 acceptance criteria met.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Underestimation of accessibility remediation effort; Discovering fundamental architectural issues that are difficult to remediate.
mitigation_strategies: Focus the entire sprint on this single goal; Involve QA with accessibility expertise from the start.
burndown_target: Task-based burndown. Low hours but high validation effort.
